text: Santi bhikkhave bhikkhū imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātikā tattha parinibbāyino anāvattidhammā tasmā lokā evarūpāpi bhikkhave santi bhikkhū imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe
edit: Santi bhikkhave bhikkhū imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātikā tattha parinibbāyino anāvattidhammā tasmā lokā – evarūpāpi bhikkhave santi bhikkhū imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe

translations.transtext: Monks, there are monks in this group, [who are] those destroying the lower five fetters of rebirth, [will] be born spontaneously, reach the final release there, normally not return from that world. Monks, there are such monks also in this group.
